gameStates

Class GameStateTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • gameStates.GameStateTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterSelectState, Engine, GameOverState, MainScreenState, PauseMenuState

    public abstract class GameStateTemplate
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
    Class that extends BasicGameState, but contains extra methods that must be overridden. All game states should extend this class. PLEASE DO NOT MAKE THE ENGINE CLASS EXTEND THIS YET
    Author:
    Frank

    • Method Detail

      • disposeObjects

        public abstract void disposeObjects()
        To override. Method for disposing objects in the current game state in order to free-up memory.

      • switchGameState

        public void switchGameState(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                            org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame sbg,
                            int ID)
        Method for handling switching game states. Automatically clears key-press records
        Parameters:
        gc - The game container of the current game
        sbg - The current instance of the state based game
        ID - The ID of the game state to switch to
